title: Cancer Isn't the Only Thing Killing Americans - BloombergQuint
description: Cancer Isn't the Only Thing Killing Americans
content: (Bloomberg Opinion) -- Americans got some fantastic health news last week: Based on the latest data, U.S. cancer deaths are plunging at the fastest rate ever.
